string.text: What happened?! ... He is dead!!!?? Come back immediately!! ....
What happened?! ... He is dead!!!?? Get the readings, and then come back as quickly as you can!!! ....

Good work S.T.A.L.K.E.R. ... you have managed to locate the machine ... now find a way to switch it off. We need you to do this in order that we may study it further, and hopefully come to understand it's purpose ... Hurry!!!

Listen, the prototype cannot protect you from strong radiation for very long. Once the timer runs out, the unit will cease to function ... and will no longer protect you .... you must hurry ... and be wary of the timer!!!

YES!!! .. you managed to switch it off .... good work S.T.A.L.K.E.R. ... you must be careful ... a couple of Choppers have arrived, and they are looking for something ... or someone. I think. Best to try and sneak out a different way than you went in ... we'll be waiting for you here back at the Lab .... once again .... nicely done!!!
